There is no try, only do and do not. You have only to believe if you wish to achieve. That rhymed. Unintentional. - Rod Kimble A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure. Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive. - Elbert Hubbard No rest is worth anything except the rest that is earned. - Jean Paul "The saddest summary of a life contains three descriptions: could have, might have, and should have." - Louis E. Boone It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop. - Confucius
